Package xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Strategy An interface for the strategies used by the Recordmanager.
TIdManager A class that implements this interface allows to translate/map a special kind of identifier into tupel identifyers.
 

Class Summary
AbstractStrategy Abstract implementation of a Strategy which is useful for most of the implemented strategies.
AppendOnlyNStrategy This class provides a append only strategy which searches inside the last n allocated pages.
AppendOnlyStrategy This class provides a append only strategy.
BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy This class provides a strategy which makes a best fit search inside pages which have the most free space.
BestFitStrategy This class provides the best-fit stratey for the record manager.
DecoratorTesterStrategy This class makes some consistency checks before forwarding the calls to another strategy.
FirstFitStrategy This class provides the first-fit-strategy for the record-manager.
HybridAONFStrategy  
HybridBFOEStrategy  
HybridStrategy  
IdentityTIdManager This class implements the TIdManager interface and always returns the same Object (identity).
LastToFirstFitStrategy This class provides a last-to-first-fit-strategy for the record-manager.
LRUStrategy  
MapTIdManager This class implements a TIdManager which uses a main memory HashMap to store the relationship between external identifyers (of type Long) and tuple identifyers inside the record manager.
NextFitStrategy This class provides the next-fit stratey for the record manager.
NextFitWithHStrategy This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
NextFitWithHWStrategy This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
OneRecordPerPageStrategy This class provides one record per page strategy.
Page This class represents a page that can contain multiple records.
RecordManager This class is an extension of Container which implements a record manager on top of a given Container.
TId This class is just a simple wrapping of the id Object and a recordNr.
Utility Some static methods which make usage of the RecordManager easier.
 

Package xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager Description

Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size. The size of each record has to be below a maximum size which is again below the pageSize.

A RecordManager can be used on top of each container. Usually, it is used on top of a BlockFileContainer or a MultiBlockContainer .
